title: How to Create a Marriage Invitation on Facebook

steps.headline: On your Homepage, where you see all your news feeds, On your left you will find a column which had sub-headings of Favorites, Groups, Applications etc.
Under the Favorites Sub-heading you will find 3 headings namely, News Feed, Messages and Events.
Click on the Events link
steps.description: This will take you to another page, that shows all your major events happening along with those of you friends. On top you will find a link that says "Create an event".

steps.headline: Click on that link.
steps.description: This will take you to another page. Here fill in the necessary details like: When, What are you planning, Where etc. Also you will find a field that says " Who's invited" and a link that says "Select guests"

steps.headline: When you click on "Select guests", it opens a window that shows you your friends.
steps.description: Select the friends to want to send the wedding invitation to.

steps.headline: You can also choose privacy options so that you can limit who all can view the particular event.

text: Have a Facebook account.  On your Homepage, where you see all your news feeds, On your left you will find a column which had sub-headings of Favorites, Groups, Applications etc.  Under the Favorites Sub-heading you will find 3 headings namely, News Feed, Messages and Events.  Click on the Events link This will take you to another page, that shows all your major events happening along with those of you friends. On top you will find a link that says "Create an event". Click on that link. This will take you to another page. Here fill in the necessary details like: When, What are you planning, Where etc. Also you will find a field that says " Who's invited" and a link that says "Select guests" When you click on "Select guests", it opens a window that shows you your friends. Select the friends to want to send the wedding invitation to. You can also choose privacy options so that you can limit who all can view the particular event.
